Welcome to Copado!
We are so excited to have you join us on this incredible journey.
What's Next
You will be completing a tailored Onboarding program over the next 4 weeks that will give you important tools and knowledge to be successful.
Taking this time to master our products, ecosystem, and competitive landscape will allow you to hit the ground running!
Agenda Snapshot
Below is a snapshot of your agenda for the first 2 days of training. You will be able to view all invites on your Copado Google Calendar once you access your laptop.
(If you have any conflicts or access issues please advise ASAP)
Key Resources:
Kristi McNabb and Lisa Maguire are your dedicated Sales Enablement team and will be guiding you through the Onboarding process.
Scotty Morrison & Jaime Djuric are here to support you with all things HR. Monday
